nodes.text: Varn, World of Water was a holodocumentary feature about the planet of Varn. Though it was quite dull, it fascinated the Kamarian Badlanders so much when Han Solo exhibited the documentary to them at his makeshift holotheater that they started a religion around it: the Cult of Varn. The Badlanders rioted when Han Solo tried to replace it with Love is Waiting.
